titles.title: CIVICS Act of 2023
CIVICS Act of 2023
Constitution education Is Valuable In Community Schools Act of 2023

A bill to amend the American History and Civics Education program under the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to require inclusion of programs that educate students about the history and principles of the Constitution of the United States, including the Bill of Rights.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary:
Constitution education Is Valuable In Community Schools Act of 2023 or the CIVICS Act of 2023
This bill requires national activities supported by American History and Civics Education grants to include programs that educate students about the history and principles of the U.S. Constitution, including the Bill of Rights.
